description: This file manages mock inventory data, including loading restaurant menus into an in-memory store, retrieving and setting stock quantities, auto-updating availability status based on stock levels, and applying default inventory properties to items.

methods.name: loadRestaurants
methods.description: Attaches menus from provided restaurants into the inventory system and initializes stock entries if missing.

methods.name: getStock
methods.description: Returns current stock quantity for a specific restaurant's item.

methods.name: setStock
methods.description: Sets stock quantity for a restaurant's item and updates its availability status.

methods.name: autoUpdateAvailability
methods.description: Automatically updates item availability based on current stock and thresholds.

methods.name: withInventoryDefaults
methods.description: Applies default inventory-related fields to a CustomerItem without mutating the original object.
